info.brief_description: Five dragons are on a journey to grow up Or will they just fall prey to others dragons?
info.description:
You will play as one of the new born dragons to survive in the wild. Spyro123 has given me permission to use a modified version of his story. The original goes to Spyo123 and credit for allowing me to write this story goes to Spyro123.



All vore is aloud.

Sex is allowed.

The baby dragons can be willing in any vore or sex, or can be unwilling. But if you add intercourse choices, try to keep the willing/unwilling option open if possible.

If you add vore choices, also try to keep the choices as willing/unwilling if possible. It keeps the story going and branching out.

They can grow up.

As a grown up they can be predators or prey depending on their size, and they can mate with other dragons and have a family.

If you have the dragons start a family, try to add in the option to use the children as well.

Try not to end a scene if you can help it. I will permit some endings, but too many and I will start making edits/deletions so the interactive story doesn't end.

In the beginning the hatchlings stand at about 1 foot on all fours and are about 2 feet long from their snout to the tip of their tail, but they can get bigger over time-- no spontaneous size change, but you can fast forward further into the future (5 years have past since...bla bla bla ect,)

I will allow lesbian stuff, just no big action (One or two chapters. Must be separated by a few chapters on non-lesbian action)

No anthros

The only things the baby dragons can eat are little things to survive like baby foxes or squirrels

If you make hard vore, some detail is allowed, but if you want to add a lot of detail, you will need to ask my permission first.

And my most important rule: HAVE FUN!!!!
